attributes.action: hold the inquiry into the Iraq War IN PUBLIC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A public inquiry is necessary to: 
A) learn lessons from the worst foreign policy debacle since Suez, that has cost many thousands of lives and done untold damage to Britain's international reputation.
B) restore public confidence - many feel we (and Parliament) were, at best, misled. 
C) compel witnesses to tell the truth, under threat of imprisonment.
THE LIES MUST END HERE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
